dmca.title: [EV1-C1968604A] Stolen Website
dmca.body:
Please note that we are able to provide you information about the
identity of the person(s) responsible for the use of the
below-referenced URLs only upon the issuance of a subpoena. Also, we can
only preserve records that currently exist pending issuance of a
preservation request.

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.  

-----Original Message-----
From: Kamran [mailto:krahbaran@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 29, 2006 1:23 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: FW: [EV1-C1968604A] Stolen Website
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C1968604A] Stolen Website


Please be advised that two of the websites were immediately pulled down
yesterday by the owners after we reached them via phone and threatened
with legal
action:

http://www.barbielayouts.com
http://girlylayoutspace.com

You probabley never saw the stolen content as they were removed before
you responded to our original email. These domains were hosting stolen
and hacked code and database content from our site and we are
contemplating pursuing legal actions. Do you have backed up copies of
the code and more importantly of the database as of yesterday for proof?

Your assessment of the third domain is correct:
http://www.myspacetuner.com

This domain, aside from exactly looking similar to our site, thus far
has refrained from including any copyrighted material. Nor do they
display any of our database data. Our investigation has revealed that
they hired someone to clone our site for them. We are, howerver,
monitoring them.

Your assistance regarding this matter is highly appreciated.
 
Regards,
Kamran Rahbaran

--- Copyright <Copyright@theplanet.com> wrote:

>  To Whom It May Concern:
>

> Subject: Stolen Website
> To: abuse@theplanet.com, krahbaran@yahoo.com
> MIME-Version: 1.0
> Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
> Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
> Message-ID:
> <764183.16587.qm@web30612.mail.mud.yahoo.com>
> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Nov 2006 23:59:20.0676
> (UTC)
> FILETIME=[389DE240:01C71349]
> 
> MIME element (text/plain)
> To Whom it may be concerned: 
>  
> I have discovered that three domains hosted by your company are using 
> stolen and copyprotected software from my website.
> In fact, they are
> using exact replications of my website code and content after they 
> hacked into my account. Most of the software and content on my website

> is custom developed and copyrighted. Here are the
> URL: 
>  
> http://www.myspacetuner.com
> http://www.barbielayouts.com
> http://girlylayoutspace.com
>  
> And here is my site: 
> http://www.codestogo.com
>  
> If you browse through their pages you will still see references to my 
> website in some flash controls that they did not get the source code
> for: 
> http://girlylayoutspace.com/flash-toys
> http://www.barbielayouts.com/flash-toys
>  
> They are even running my ValueMedia.com and Google adsense code on 
> their pages. The "Contact Us" form still sends to my original email 
> address.
>  
> The owner of www.barbielayouts.com is also running the following site:
> http://www.PwnMyspace.com
>  
> Please block, remove and permanently ban these URL's and the 
> individuals responsible for this illegal act.
>  
> I have also hired an attorney to assist me in this matter, but I seek 
> to immediatley stop these URLs to operate.
>  
> Please do not hesitate to contact me for any further information.
>  
> Regards,
> Kamran Rahbaran
> www.CodesToGo.com
>  
>  
>  
>  
>
